description: Blueberries are small, round berries with a deep blue-purple color and a sweet, slightly tart flavor. They grow on shrubs and are known for their high antioxidant content and distinctive blue skin.

flavor_profile.notes: Sweet with subtle tartness and floral undertones

storage_tips: Store unwashed in the refrigerator for up to 10 days. Spread in a single layer to prevent crushing. For longer storage, freeze on a baking sheet, then transfer to freezer bags. Frozen blueberries work excellently for jams.
preparation: Wash gently just before using. Remove any stems or leaves. For jams, can be used whole or lightly crushed to release juices. Small berries work well whole in jams.
